pages.title: Amazonian Manatee
pages.text: The Amazonian manatee ($(o)Trichechus inunguis$()) is a species of manatee that lives in the Amazon Basin in Brazil, Peru, Colombia and Ecuador.$(br2)It has thin, wrinkled brownish or gray colored skin, with fine hairs scattered over its body and a white chest patch.

pages.title: Amazonian Manatee
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:sea_grass$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
